author: Max Monis
description: Online multiplayer movie and actor game
name: bomb

scripts.build: tsc && vite build --emptyOutDir --mode production && NODE_ENV=production node esbuild.mjs
scripts.dev: concurrently -n client,server "vite --host" "nodemon --watch api --ext ts --exec 'node esbuild.mjs && node .build/api/server.js'"
scripts.prod: vite build --emptyOutDir --mode development && node esbuild.mjs && NODE_ENV=production PORT=3000 node .build/api/server.js
